snippet: It is essential for the Senate to approve a global treaty that would apply the principles of the Americans With Disabilities Act to the world at large.
abstract: Editorial calls on Senate Democrats to vote as one, if another vote is allowed,  to approve United Nations treaty defending rights of people with disabilities; urges Republicans to rise above the hackneyed politicking that undermined the vote last year.
lead_paragraph: It is essential for the Senate to approve a global treaty that would apply the principles of the Americans With Disabilities Act to the world at large.

headline.main: A Second Chance for the World’s Disabled
headline.print_headline: A Second Chance for the World’s Disabled
